Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people who are trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone device that uses sound to help the people communicate.
The student can show how the device allows information to travel from one person to the other.
The student can incorporate materials in the drawing that indicate the use of sound, like a string, cups, or cans.
The student can represent the concept of people using technology to communicate over distances.
The student can explain through their drawing how the device works to solve the problem of long-distance communication.
